name: Litar Virus Encrypted File
summary: A file with a litar extension has been encrypted by the Litar virus, which is a variant of STOP ransomware utilized by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .PDF , .WMV , .MP3 , or .BAK file, that has been renamed and encrypted by the virus. LITAR files became prevalent in June 2019.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
